author: Rod B
comment: Most of the reason I paid for this watch face was to have that redraw of the display elements like an old departures board.  This watch face doesn't seem to do that.
title: Not animated like a real departures board?

author: Ryan Clayton
comment: No animation and the weather area is showing nothing.  Refunded

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Ryan, 
thank you for the feedback but this watchface is not an animation based design. For the weather misinformation can be caused when you do not allowed the watchface to access your weather information, nor you turned on your GPS. Please check and if the same error pops up please email us (ask.watchmaster@gmail.com)
Thank you.

author: Tod Brewster
comment: This watch face is rad but it doesn't allow phonecall notifications on my Moto 360.
title: Doesn't allow call notifications

author: Brian Lazenby
comment: Great but battery level widget would improve.
